titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funerall of M. Christopher Love, in St. Laurence church, August, 25. 1651. By Thomas Manton, minister of the gospell at Stoak-Newington near London.
titleStmt.author: Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
